decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - Development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details with reference to 01255/22/P6(2,14A,17) dated 14/02/2017 or as otherwise agreed in writing with the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (0459 000 Rev B1, 0459 110 Rev P3, 0459 111 Rev P3, 0459 112 Rev P3, 0459 312 Rev P1, 0459 310 Rev P1, Received: 29/01/2016. 0459 150 Rev C3, Received: 10/05/2017. 0459 102 Rev C4, 0459 311 Rev P1(A), Received: 16/05/2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am  to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9 :00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The development shall be carried out in accordance with the details approved under decision reference 01255/22/P6(5,6,10) dated 22/04/2016 or as otherwise agreed in writing with the Local Planning Authority

Condition : 6 - The development shall be carried out in accordance with the details approved under decision reference 01255/22/P6(5,6,10) dated 22/04/2016 or as otherwise agreed in writing with the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 7 - The development shall be carried out in accordance with the details approved under decision reference 01255/22/P6(7,15A) dated 17/01/2017 or as otherwise agreed in writing with the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 8 - The development shall be carried out in accordance with the details approved under decision reference 01255/22/P6(8,9,13A,16A) dated 03/05/2017 or as otherwise agreed in writing with the Local Planning Authority

Condition : 9 - The development hereby permitted shall be designed and constructed in accordance with the Lifetimes Home Standards as set out in the London Plan and Accessible London Supplementary Planning Guidance.

Condition : 10 - The development shall be carried out in accordance with the details approved under decision reference 01255/22/P6(5,6,10) dated 22/04/2016 or as otherwise agreed in writing with the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 11 - The approved scheme for protecting the proposed residential accommodation from excessive external noise shall be implemented with all windows being double glazed with acoustic trickle vents and all dwellings to utilise Mechanical Ventilation and Heat Recovery (MVHR) systems and any works which form part of such a scheme shall be completed before any part of the development is first occupied or used.

Condition : 12 - The bin store shown on the approved drawings shall be provided prior to the occupation of the development and shall be permanently retained thereafter unless otherwise agreed beforehand by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 13 - (A) The development shall be carried out in accordance with the details approved under decision reference 01255/22/P6(8,9,13A,16A) dated 03/05/2017 or as otherwise agreed in writing with the Local Planning Authority.

(B) The building(s) shall not be occupied until evidence (schedule of fittings and manufactures literature) has been submitted to the Local Planning Authority and approved in writing to show that the development has been constructed in accordance with the approved internal water use calculations.


(B) The building(s) shall not be occupied until evidence (schedule of fittings and manufactures literature) has be submitted to the Local Planning Authority and approved in writing to show that the development has been constructed in accordance with the approved internal water use calculations.

Condition : 14 - (A) The development shall be carried out in accordance with the details approved under decision reference 01255/22/P6(2,14A,17) dated 14/02/2017 or as otherwise agreed in writing with the Local Planning Authority.

(B) The building(s) shall not be occupied until evidence has (e.g. photographs and copies of installation contracts) have been submitted to the Local Planning Authority and approved in writing to demonstrate that the development has been carried out in accordance with the approved details.

Condition : 15 - (A) The refuse store as shown on the approved plans shall be completed and available to residents the development hereby approved is first occupied.

(B) The building(s) shall not be occupied until evidence has (e.g. photographs and copies of installation contracts) have been submitted to the Local Planning Authority and approved in writing to demonstrate that the development has been carried out in accordance with the approved details.

Condition : 16 - (A) The development shall be carried out in accordance with the details approved under decision reference 01255/22/P6(8,9,13A,16A) dated 03/05/2017 or as otherwise agreed in writing with the Local Planning Authority.

(B) The building(s) shall not be occupied until evidence has (e.g. photographs and copies of installation contracts) have been submitted to the Local Planning Authority and approved in writing to demonstrate that the development has been carried out in accordance with the approved details.

Condition : 17 - The development shall be carried out in accordance with the details approved under decision reference 01255/22/P6(2,14A,17) dated 14/02/2017 or as otherwise agreed in writing with the Local Planning Authority.
description: Variation of condition 3 (approved plans) and 12 (bin store)  for planning permission 01255/22/P6 dated 24/07/2015 for demolition of existing dwelling and erection of a three-storey building containing six self-contained flats, with a new vehicle crossover, boundary walls, landscaping and car and cycle parking.
